announcement.heading: HMDA Online FIG
announcement.message: Prototype HMDA Filing Instructions Guide (FIG) now online. Note: future updates may change page structures and links.

announcement.heading: Documentation Overhaul
announcement.message: A new and enhanced HMDA documentation page has been released! In addition to an improved visual design, financial institutions now have the ability to search the consolidated documentation and API documentation has been integrated.

announcement.heading: Online LAR Formatting Tool
announcement.message: The Online LAR Formatting tool has been released! Financial institutions can now create an electronic file online to submit to the HMDA Platform. Check out the

toolAnnouncement.heading: Graphs are being updated!
toolAnnouncement.message: 2023-Q1 quarertly graphs data is being added. There might be some unexpected interruptions as the service is being updated.

toolAnnouncement.heading: Rate Spread Maintenance
toolAnnouncement.message: The rate spread service is going to be down from 6PM EST - 8PM EST for scheduled maintenance.
